tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_ratings (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    rating INT,
    comment TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE product_comments(
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    comment VARCHAR,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES product_feedback(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE product_ratings (
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    rating INT NOT NULL,
    comments TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (product_id, user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE product_comments (
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    comment_id INT NOT NULL,
    comment_text TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (product_id, user_id, comment_id)
);
